response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe will greatly benefit you and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its quality and the unique features it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional deal considering its market value and the benefits it will bring to you. I look forward to hearing your response soon. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 9500}
